banner_title: Trust data, not words. Check any car's history in seconds
banner_subtitle: Buying used? We scan 900+ global databases to help you avoid bad deals & decide if the car is truly right for you.
features_title: We check what sellers won't tell you
features_subtitle: TrueAutoCheck scans over a billion verified records to help you lower the risk of buying a used car – in just 55 seconds.
feature_spot_damage_desc: We check over 300 million records to show you where and when the damage occurred, and what the repairs might have cost (if that data is available).
feature_verify_mileage_desc: Easily verify a vehicle mileage, backed by data from 900+ trusted sources across 35 countries.
feature_specs_title: Get to know the car inside & out
feature_specs_desc: Our Specs & Equipment data shows you everything, from the car technical details to the original features like navigation and safety systems.
feature_value_title: Know what the car is really worth
feature_value_desc: See how the car price compares against similar cars in your area – so you can avoid overpaying or undervaluing.
feature_avoid_hidden_title: Avoid cars with a hidden past
feature_avoid_hidden_desc: Spot write-off categories (like Cat S or N) so you know if the car has been seriously damaged or declared a total loss.
feature_safety_title: See if the car is safe to drive
feature_safety_desc: Our Safety ratings data shows crash-test ratings from top agencies, helping you avoid cars with hidden risks.
feature_disasters_desc: Our Natural Disasters data flags cars that may have been exposed to floods, storms, or other natural events – even if the damage is not visible.
why_title: Why smart car buyers start with TrueAutoCheck
why_subtitle: A TrueAutoCheck vehicle history report is your first step to knowing what's worth your money, what's worth your time, and what makes the best final choice.
why_section1_title: Prevent costly errors before they happen.
why_section1_desc: Detect previous damage, odometer tampering, and other expensive problems in advance — so you can avoid costly surprises down the road.
why_section2_title: Locate your ideal car more quickly.
why_section2_desc: Skip unnecessary test drives by reviewing the car's history online and focus only on vehicles that are truly worth seeing.
why_section3_desc: Discover the full history of the car, stay one step ahead of the seller, and leverage the details to negotiate a better deal.
pricing_subtitle: Get instant access to comprehensive vehicle history reports. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.
pricing_protect_desc: Access comprehensive vehicle history before you buy

privacy_intro: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This page explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights.
privacy_collection_paragraph: We collect information you provide when ordering a report, such as email and vehicle details, as well as analytics data to improve our service.
privacy_use_paragraph: We use collected data to process orders, deliver reports, improve our product, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell personal data.
privacy_security_paragraph: We apply industry-standard security practices including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, and regular audits to keep your data safe.
privacy_contact_paragraph: If you have questions about your data or wish to exercise your rights, contact support via the contact page or email our support team.
terms_intro: These Terms explain the rules and responsibilities when using our services. By using the site you agree to these terms.
terms_user_responsibilities_paragraph: You agree to provide accurate information and to use the service lawfully. Unauthorized use or abuse of the service is prohibited.
terms_limitation_paragraph: We provide information and tools for vehicle history checks; while we strive for accuracy, we do not guarantee completeness and are not liable for indirect damages.
terms_contact_paragraph: For questions about these Terms, reach out to our support team via the contact page.
security_intro: Protecting the security of our systems and your data is a top priority. Below we summarize our approach.
security_measures_paragraph: We use secure hosting, encrypted connections (TLS), regular security testing, and strict internal access controls to safeguard systems and data.
security_contact_paragraph: If you discover a vulnerability, please contact our security team through the contact page with full details so we can investigate promptly.
refund_intro: We want you to be satisfied. This policy explains how refunds are handled for report purchases.
refund_scope_paragraph: Refunds are evaluated on a per-order basis. If a report was not delivered or there is a clear error, we will investigate and offer a refund where appropriate.
refund_process_paragraph: To request a refund, contact support with your order number and details. We typically respond within 3 business days and process refunds via the original payment method.
refund_contact_paragraph: For refund requests, please use the contact form or email our support team with the order number and issue.
